title: Week Three - Eat Slowly and Savour Your Food

items.text:
Continue with your experiment from the previous week. If it’s been going well then increase the difficulty slightly eg raise your ‘chew goal’.
If you’ve found it difficult then scale it back slightly. Remember the goal is to get regular practice.

If you’d like to change Experiment then you can.

items.title: Experiments
items: Put down your cutlery after each mouthful
Set a chew goal per mouthful
Halve every mouthful before you eat it
